ComicInfo.Title: Murder in the First
ComicInfo.Summary: Christina Baker is in the Philadelphia State University library trying to wrte her Sociology Term paper and begins to have a bad migraine. She decides to go home, and while she was walking, she notices someone in one of the building and decides to investigate it. She sees one of the guards unconscious and continues to investigate. She comes across this woman and red-skinned man doing something. Christina is then greeted by Blackmass from behind. Meanwhile, Spellcaster is woken up from her beach shore home by her owl, who shows her something. Back to Christina, she gets a headache and then the Coven are greeted by Pentacle (A traitor to the Coven) and Golem. The Coven battle Pentacle and Golem until they are interrupted by Grimoire (Blackmass' brother), who saves Pentacle and Golem and leaves.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 12:34:23. [Issue ID 118288]

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Pollina,Ian Churchill,Jon Sibal,Rob Liefeld,Tanya Horie
